item.title: VB-LoRA: Extreme Parameter Efficient Fine-Tuning with Vector Banks
item.description: VB-LoRA achieves extreme parameter efficiency in fine-tuning LLMs by sharing parameters globally via a vector bank, outperforming state-of-the-art PEFT methods while maintaining comparable or better p…
